any news about 1214 pc????tnks lot

PC users: 
You can use files from the IPAD version to partially update the PC version.
Out of the latest IPAD update take the files airports.dbf, charts.ini charts.bin (-Documents-Data-Termcharts).
Rename airports.dbf to Airports.dbf and charts.bin to Charts.bin.
Copy these 3 files to your Jeppesen-Common-TerminalCharts folder on your PC to replace the older versions.
This will update the terminal charts to the current version while we wait for the full PC update.
